brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts an activity in which you must determine which EIGRP table, Neighbor, Topology, or Routing, would be the most appropriate to find the specified information.

One.Interface connected to neighbor device.
Two.Next hop address for the feasible successor.
Three.Amount of time since an adjacency was established.
Four.State that DUAL has calculated the route.
Five.IP address of neighbor devices.
Six.The successors advertised distance.
Seven.The route was learned from an external routing process.
Eight.The administrative distance associated with the route.
